CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PffBB-n polymers
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PffBB-n

The other entities mentioned, "alkyl side chains" and "Figure 1", are not material names and have been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |

The table above shows the material name "PffBB-n" as it appears in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "aggregation ability"
2. "strength"

These are the names of properties that are being described or discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property:

1. "strength"

The entity "aggregation ability" is not a material property, it's a property of the polymers' behavior, so I removed it.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| strength |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. "the aggregation ability"
2. "the strength"
3. "the size of the alkyl side chains"
4. "n = 10"
5. "n = 16"
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. "the aggregation ability"
2. "the strength"

These two entities refer to the properties of the PffBB-n polymers that are being studied, and their values are being described in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| aggregation ability |
| strength |
